txt: Hello Madeleine. How are you?
Hi, I'm fine, but I just hate how Jonas Ketrel from Segfaultland keeps talking that Webvestee should care about democratic values ðŸ˜‚
I have heard the news. Quite interesting, but judging from your emotes you aren't fond of it, are you?
Yeah, but personally I think this is somewhat wrong of him. Just imagine how a potential coup could ruin your beautiful country!
I am fine too, but jumping right away into politics?
JONAS IS A LIAR SEGFAULTLAND IS ON A VERGE OF COLLAPSE THEY MIGHT LOSE A WAR IF REVERSELAND STARTS ONE ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
TOTALLY HE DOESN'T CARE ABOUT OUR COUNTRY HE ONLY WANTS TO BE RICH! So glad you understand the severity of his lies

I live in Segfaultland but I do not think it is on a verge of collapse. I have just finished trade school as a Computer Scientists, and even though I am not very wealthy, I can see a bright future for both of our nations
Well, I don't know... I just own a computer, a bed and a fridge. It ain't much, but it's honest work. And how's the life under Vasya Eclaire?
Well, politicians are usually liars. I am not rich. I just own a computer, a bed and a fridge. It ain't much, but it's honest work. And how's the life under Vasya Eclaire?

Yeah, he ain't the sharpest tool in the shed. I wish I could get away from all this politics... That's why I finished Computer Science trade school, so maybe I'll have a solid job and get the chance to travel the world.
Democracy will never persist haahhahahahah!!!!! You can trust Jonas but he will destroy you!!! And your country, your economy, your houses, your hospitals, your TV, your free speech!
Every one of us has a bed, a fridge, a broom, a bike. We have many parks and forests and we have everything that Segfaultland lacks! They dont have skyscrapers or toilet paper they're so poor
He isn't the one I look up to. As you might see, I hate politics
So you like our dear comrade Vasya?

Only the time will tell. And if it happens, I hope I will have the chance to get away from all this politics... That's why I finished Computer Science trade school, so maybe I'll have a solid job and get the chance to travel the world.
It seems nice to live there. Maybe I will pay your country a visit someday?
Well I had those when I lived at my parents' place. But now whether I need a broom or just some sugar, I just ask my neighbour. He's kind. Are your neighbours as kind as mine?
Well if he does, I hope your country would be better to live in.
Yes you must! And you should stay! All people are welcome here (unless they don't want to work). We're a big community we love each other :D

All my neighbors who are Webvesteevian are great! We all share things and help each other at need. That's how communism works, but Jonas doesn't understand that!!! I also have a neighbor from Segfaultland and he's awful, he almost never shares things and he spends all day alone in his apartment instead of going outside for a min
And when I do so, maybe we could be neighbors?

Maybe he's quite shy. A lot of people open up if you invite them over for a tea. And they open up even more when you invite them over for a tea with something... stronger. I think he'll appreciate that!
Do you even know his name? Quite rude of him if he wouldn't even introduce himself...
I don't live in Webvestee, but I think he's okay as it is. Webvestee under him is quite a peaceful neighbour.
You'd be a better neighbor than the one from Segfaultland that I already have haha
I already know a lot about him hahaha more than he possibly imagines!! My neighbor somehow got to know his name (Leslie Moore what a wierd name)
People from Segfaultland are probably all like that :( I think he's called Leslie Moore or something like that, but I know this from my neighbor who has access to secret info (ooops :P)
He's more than okay! Glad you understand. You'd be a better neighbor than the one from Segfaultland that I already have haha
I consider myself a hard worker. I'll gladly join your community if it's as good as it sounds. Can you tell me more about your local community?
Leslie is a common name around here in Segfaultland. Are there any other unsettling things about him that your neighbour shared with you?
Not me at least. People from Segfaultland are usually very open people, at least here, where I live. Why should he be so secretive?
What's wrong with him?
He's awful, he almost never shares things and he spends all day alone in his apartment instead of going outside for a min
they told me he's hiding from the authorities?! im scared rn i think I heard some noise from his apartment
Hello?
Are you there?
A noise? Maybe he is drilling in the wall to hang a picture of Jonas?
You are quite a gossiper, aren't you? What else did the neighbour tell you?
